website_summaries.verdict: Chunky heel is a great feature if you need to be on your feet all day.
pros: Comes in barley king suede, black goat patent, black kid suede and nude Eva classic patent

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting and watching for these shoes to go on sale and I was so excited when they finally did. This was shortlived because the fit is awkward (not too big or too small) and even though there is padding in the arch, it is not what you expect it to be considering the brand. There's no support there. Such a bummer that after all that pining, I had to send them back. :(
customer_reviews.author: kkb

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and all-day comfortable. Perfect classic heels!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, yet still stylish, which is hard to find. They are true to size. The block heel has a little added style to it. I have these in black patent, and they work for every occasion. I ordered the red for the holidays...the color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toe box is snug ... and the vendor is annoying!
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is a tad snug; these shoes are not meant for wearing all day. Even worse is the vendor's return policy: I mean, the vendor insists that you pay to ship the goods back. Had I known this, I wouldn't have bought the shoes in the first place. I ended up giving the shoes away.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Easily damaged patent leather.
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning it because the patent leather creased when I tried it on once. The shoe is destined to look terrible after a few wears. By comparison my aresoles that I’m replacing have no crease and I’ve been wearing them regularly for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Tulin

customer_reviews.title: Very professional looking with comfort.
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is looking for style and comfort I would recommend Sofft shoes. I have purchased 2 before and I am on my feet 12+ hrs. I do not need to change to other shoes as I often had to do in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful comfy shoe but a bit tight in toe box
customer_reviews.text: Love these & get compliments on them in the gorgeous red! Toe box a bit tight but if i wear hide socks they are fine . Sofft are my favs as they are so comfy . If I wear socks I can be in these all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Sad to return it
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were so beautiful and elegant. I am having difficulties with size in shoes that are close vs. sandals. If this is not your problem, you would not regret buying them. They are gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Sanchez Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I love, love these shoes. They are comfortable and so pretty on. I had compliments all day long when I first wore them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: curlygirrl

customer_reviews.title: Soffit Shoes worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe looks stunning great he’ll I own at least 10 pairs of soffit I have a wide foot plus no arch and can walk all day
customer_reviews.author: Donnarose

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Too large I had to send back Color is as expected Looks just like the pic
customer_reviews.author: treevnp

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. I needed it for back issues. I’m not sure how much it actually supports but it works for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Em

customer_reviews.title: The Quality & Durability
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort the most . colour & the design is great
customer_reviews.author: Nilanthi Wijegunawardena

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Because I have a narrow foot, was too wide in the heel.
customer_reviews.author: mattie d newton

customer_reviews.title: Black patent leather, size 9 — gorgeous but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm an 8.5 (sometimes 9) and bought these in size 9. I have a medium width foot but I like shoes with a roomy toe box; my foot is just a tad wide in front. These, although they do run a tiny bit smaller than Sofft's Sharnell boots, had enough room in the toe box but the topline of the shoe dug into my feet. I put them on at home and wore them for a very short time — seated — and ouch! After just a few minutes it was clear that although they looked fabulous, they were a no go. Patent leather is difficult...so little stretch...

customer_reviews.title: Stylish AND Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in red. They are sexy, but fit my wide feet and are very comfortable for heels. Love the shape of the block heel. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Baldwin

product_meta.title: Sofft - Womens - Tamira
product_meta.description: A fashionably sleek block heeled pump with contoured comfort footbed.
feature_bullets: Offered in patent leather or suede
